title: Hybrid WIPS Design code
abstractText: 'In this propsal we will develop a hyrbid low power ice proection modellisation tool. This will consist of combining our existing knwoledge on separate electrothermal and electromechancial ice proections systems into a single, integrated, computer code. We will also test (but not manufacture, which is a separate CfP) a hybrid Wing Ice Protection System (WIPS) in an icing wind tunnel. The data gathered during the icing wind tunnel test will be used to validate the new design code'
